column2: Brooge Energy Ltd. is a holding company, which is created for the purpose of effectuating the business combination with Twelve Seas Investment Company. The Company, through its subsidiary is engaged in the operation of independent oil refinery and storage. The company also offers services, including blending, heating, inter-tank transfer and throughput transfer. Brooge Petroleum and Gas Investment Company FZE is the subsidiary of the Company.
A M F Building, 25-28 Old Burlington Street
